pages.title: Breaking the Arcane Barrier
pages.text: $(#734608)To break the Arcane Barrier, you must explode it with magic. A $(item)Magic Bomb$()$(#734608), created by breaking down a Volatile Core, is one way to explode the barrier.  $()
$(#734608)Be warned, breaking the Arcane Barrier will let out all the evil that has been trapped in there for centuries. $()
